eventSummary: Attackers are exploiting a zero-day flaw in Chrome, urging users to update Chrome immediately.Sources:- https://www.reddit.com/r/cybersecurity/comments/1p1ktpe/update_chrome_asap_attackers_are_already/

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary: A team warned that scammers or regimes could have exploited a flaw, noting key-reuse patterns suggesting unauthorized clients, and called it the largest documented phone number exposure, though all collected data was deleted.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m5xpar5umq2s

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary: An actor exploited a third-party server used by a municipality to steal and leak internal documents, and accessed a database containing citizen police records. This incident is pending verification.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m5xm74ynkb2h
